Compliance & Security

Sensitive workloads and data are confined to Azure Government with FedRAMP High compliance.

Compliance Statement

Headen Tech Solutions (HTS) operates with a public/static website for marketing and information only. No government data is collected or processed on the public site. All sensitive workloads and client data are handled exclusively within our Azure Government environment, which supports FedRAMP High baselines.

Controls are aligned to NIST 800-53 and 800-171 requirements within the Azure Government boundary. Public-facing pages follow Section 508 / WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility practices. For operational access, users authenticate through Entra ID (Azure AD) in Azure Government.

Security Architecture

  • Public website: Static content only, no data processing
  • Sensitive workloads: Azure Government (FedRAMP High)
  • Authentication: Entra ID (Azure AD) in Azure Government
  • Accessibility: WCAG 2.1 AA compliant public pages

Security Standards

Our solutions align with federal security requirements and best practices.

NIST 800-53

Security controls aligned with NIST 800-53 requirements within Azure Government boundaries.

NIST 800-171

Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI) protection standards implemented.

Section 508

Public-facing pages follow Section 508 / WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility practices.

Azure Government Environment

All sensitive workloads operate within FedRAMP High authorized Azure Government.

Security Features

  • FedRAMP High authorization
  • Entra ID (Azure AD) authentication
  • Encryption at rest and in transit
  • Continuous monitoring and logging

Compliance Benefits

  • Pre-authorized for high-impact systems
  • Reduced ATO timeline
  • Automated compliance reporting
  • Regular security assessments

Accessibility Statement

We are committed to providing accessible digital experiences for all users.

Our Commitment

Headen Tech Solutions is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We continually improve the user experience for everyone and apply the relevant accessibility standards.

Standards

This website strives to conform to WCAG 2.1 AA standards. We use semantic HTML, proper heading structure, keyboard navigation support, and sufficient color contrast ratios.

Accommodations

If you encounter accessibility barriers or need accommodations, please contact us at consulting@headentechsolutions.com
